question: Which of the following teams has clinched the 2019 Sudirman Cup badminton tournament?
explanation: On May 26, China clinched the badminton world mixed-team championship at the  16th edition of the Sudirman Cup 2019 in the Chinese city of Nanning. They beat Japan in men\'s doubles, women\'s singles and men\'s singles to clinch the title for an 11th time. In the latest Men\' singles match Shi Yuqi stunned world champion Kento Momota  15-21, 21-5,21-11. Japan has never lifted the mixed-team world championship since it began in 1989.
